title: Fork and Suggest
description: Start by forking the BitTerms repository on GitHub. You can suggest edits, illustrations, or new terms via pull requests.

title: Use the Contribution Template
description: Follow our structured template when submitting new terms or edits, it helps us review faster.

title: Be Respectful and Collaborative
description: BitTerms is a team effort. Share feedback kindly, stay open to suggestions, and respect other contributors.

title: Check the Issues Tab
description: Look out for open tasks, terms needing illustrations, or definitions that need simplification, make a suggestion where you feel most confident.
